pages.text: There used to be a Yamazakura tree in an unknown village of Tomihara State.$(br2)The Second Cycle of Lunar Calendar, The year of Moon, Summer and Wood. Meteorite stroke the village, destroyed everything except the Yamazakura. The following year, a group of peopel found the miracle of that Yamazakura tree, so they established a new village around it,

and called the new village Yamazakura Village.$(br2)Before the War for Stealing Territory, in order to save the Tomihara from danger, all remaining Tomihara smiths who were capable to smith steel katanas, got together, and spent a year smithing 12 high-tier steel Blades. The process was tragic. Some of those smiths were killed by ninjas, the other suicided with the Blades to infuse the Blade with devils' power and strengthen the Blade.

However, the severe accident occured. Devils' power infused in the Blades was so strong that it summoned the Devil who used to be subdued, and it devoured all Blades. So many Tomihara warriors sacrificed for subduing the Devil again with their remaining weapons.$(br2)Now we can only find the replica of 9 Blades of those 12 Blades.$(br)They come from the former Central Force territory, but they are only similar in shape.
